trans: To fault is to blame or criticize someone or something for a mistake or problem.

name: grass
trans: To grass is to inform on someone, especially to the authorities.

name: guy
trans: To guy is to mock or tease someone in a playful way.

name: highlight
trans: To highlight is to emphasize or draw attention to something.

name: island
trans: To island is to isolate or separate something like an island.

name: joke
trans: To joke is to tell a funny story or make a humorous comment.

name: jury
trans: To jury is to serve as a member of a jury in a trial.

name: leg
trans: To leg is to kick or hit something with one's leg.

name: lip
trans: To lip is to mouth or say something silently without making a sound.

name: mate
trans: To mate is to breed or pair animals together.

name: nerve
trans: To nerve is to give someone the courage or confidence to do something.

name: passage
trans: To passage is to move or travel through a narrow or confined space.

name: pen
trans: To pen is to write or compose something.

name: pride
trans: To pride is to feel proud or pleased about something.

name: priest
trans: To priest is to ordain or become a priest.

name: promise
trans: To promise is to make a commitment or assurance to do something.

name: resort
trans: To resort is to turn to a particular course of action as a last option.

name: ring
trans: To ring is to produce a sound or noise like a bell or telephone.

name: roof
trans: To roof is to cover a building or structure with a roof.

name: rope
trans: To rope is to tie or secure something with a rope.

name: sail
trans: To sail is to travel on water in a vessel using wind power.

name: scheme
trans: To scheme is to make a plan or plot, often with a dishonest or secretive motive.

name: script
trans: To script is to write or compose a script or screenplay.

name: slight
trans: To slight is to insult or disrespect someone by treating them as unimportant or insignificant.

name: smart
trans: To smart is to feel a sharp, stinging pain.

name: sock
trans: To sock is to hit someone or something with a closed fist.

name: station
trans: To station is to place or position something or someone in a particular location.

name: toe
trans: To toe is to touch or push something with one's toes.

name: tower
trans: To tower is to rise high above something, like a tower or building.

name: truck
trans: To truck is to transport or move goods by truck or other vehicle.

name: witness
trans: To witness is to see or observe an event or situation.
